list.title: Stranger Things
list.description: Remember where items are placed  As you pick up and throw down items, it’s easy to lose track of where everything is. Fortunately, items in Granny do not reset, even if you’re caught by granny and sent back to bed for the rest of the day.  The screwdriver is an important exception. It’s always on the shelf in the entrance. You will need to shoot it down with the crossbow or the shotgun to retrieve it.  Remembering where each item is located will prevent you from unnecessary backtracking and frustration. The best way to handle this is to throw items where they can easily be found — preferably right in front of the heavily secured front door.  Since it’s right in the middle of the house, it’s easy to fling items into the foyer. From the third floor, you can chuck items into the hole in the middle of the floor (the part that falls through) and they’ll land safely in the entrance. From the second floor, just throw them off the railing.

list.title: Avatar
list.description: Grab the pliers early  Most of the items in Granny have a single use, but not the pliers. They’re useful in three different parts of the house. Consider yourself lucky if you manage to find them early.  Here’s a list of what the pliers are for:      Cut the circuit box in the basement, unlocking one of the locks on the front door     Disable the alarm on the door     Turn off the fan upstairs, giving access to a key item  Once those tasks are complete, you can safely chuck the pliers and move on.

list.title: Squid Game
list.description: The free-to-play horror game Granny has been out for a while now on Android and iOS, but thanks to frequent updates from creator DVloper, it’s managed to stay relevant more than six months after its release. For such a simple game, that’s no small feat.  Beating Granny is actually challenging. Without a beginner’s guide, new players are unlikely to make it further than the starting room without being clubbed by their dear grandmother.  To help, we’ve put together this list of tips & tricks for the popular Granny horror game. This guide does not spoil the ending, so don’t worry about ruining any surprises the game has to offer.

list.title: Alice in Borderland
list.description: A group of bored delinquents are transported to a parallel dimension as part of a survival game.

list.title: Stranger Things
list.description: In a small town where everyone knows everyone, a peculiar incident starts a chain of events that leads to the disappearance of a child, which begins to tear at the fabric of an otherwise peaceful community.

list.title: Squid Game5
list.description: Tentés par un prix alléchant en cas de victoire, des centaines de joueurs désargentés acceptent de s'affronter lors de jeux pour enfants aux enjeux mortels.
